content.article_body: LAHORE, Mar 08 (APP):Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Saturday appreciated the security forces for carryingA out a successful operation against Fitna-al-Khawarij (terrorists) in district Tank. The prime minister paid tribute to the security forces for killing three terrorists He said the entire nation was standing with security forces in war against terrorism. Shehbaz Sharif said: aWe are fully determined to completely root out terrorism
